Carmel, Californiais has an massive illegal forgery community. Passports, State ID's, Certified original birth certificates. 1 in 7 households are depicted in this flick.

plot: Joshua Mason (Josh Hutcherson) is a troubled 15-year-old who is abandoned and finds himself in Carmel, California. Being an incredible art prodigy, Joshua gets introduced to the world of art forgery. While there, he befriends a retired artist named Annemarie Sterling (Lauren Bacall) who recalls the early days of Carmel artists and their legacy of artistic integrity.
